title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Product Name: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

Product Details:

This beautiful Christmas decoration set includes a wreath and a garland that are both pre-lit with 100 warm LED lights. The wreath has a diameter of 23.6 inches and is made of snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. The garland measures 8.8 feet in length and is made of the same materials.

The lights are battery operated and require 3 AA batteries (not included). They feature a timer function that turns the lights on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours. The set does not require any assembly and is made of sturdy, high-quality materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof.

This set is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use and can be displayed on walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows. It is strong, durable, and requires minimal maintenance as it never fades and does not require water.

The set comes with a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service availability.

Bring the holiday spirit into your home with this Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!
